Comment.Content:
It is really the shame that in the year 2009 in february we get such an outdated book. Mostly when NHibernate is changing so fast, v2.1 is comming with few neat changes, FluentNhibernate is here etc etc...
I would buy this book, just my opinnion, better watch _excellent_ summerofnhibernate.com videos.
Comment.Author: cowgaR
